statements: SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customer_information WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE address LIKE 'New York%';
SELECT id, name, email, address FROM customer_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT id, purchase_history FROM customer_information WHERE name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customer_information WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, address FROM customer_information WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE LENGTH(phone_number) > 10 AND JSON_LENGTH(purchase_history) > 0;
SELECT DISTINCT name, address FROM customer_information WHERE LENGTH(address) > 10 ORDER BY name ASC, address DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, amount FROM Purchases WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_date FROM Purchases WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS num_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_purchases > 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, contact_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS total_activities FROM customer_activities GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_activities >= 5;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_description FROM customer_activities WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, count(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 3 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '1234567890';
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.product_name, od.quantity FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' AND phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, a.street_address, a.city, a.state, a.zip_code FROM customers c JOIN addresses a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id WHERE a.state = 'California';

SELECT o.order_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, p.product_name, od.quantity FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN order_details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;
